title: General forms
content:
General forms

State Regulations

Form GF-1 - Order to show cause

Form GF-2 - Summons

Form GF-3 - Warrant of arrest

Form GF-4 - Court-issued subpoena

Form GF-5 - Temporary order of protection

Form GF-5a - Order of protection

Form GF-5b - Affidavit in support of issuance of Family Court temporary order of protection (individual complainant petitioner) (Criminal Form 3)

Form GF-5c - Affidavit in support of issuance of Family Court temporary order of protection (peace or police officer, agency or designated person) (Criminal Form 4)

Form GF-5d - Affidavit in support of modification of Family Court temporary order of protection or order of protection (Criminal Form 5)

Form GF-5e - Affidavit in support of entry of out-of-state order of protection or temporary order of protection onto statewide registry of orders of protection (Criminal Form 4-b) (Supreme Court Form SC-4)

Form GF-6 - Temporary order of protection (person in need of supervision or juvenile delinquency)

Form GF-6a - Order of protection (person in need of supervision or juvenile delinquency)

Form GF-7 - Summons (violation of order of protection)

Form GF-7a - Summons (violation of court order)

Form GF-8 - Petition-violation of order of protection

Form GF-8a - Petition for violation of court order

Form GF-9 - Violation of court order with commitment

Form GF-10 - Notice of motion for extension or modification of order of protection

Form GF-10-a - Affidavit in support of motion for extension or modification of order of protection

Form GF-11 - Order of commitment

Form GF-12 - Clerk's certification

Form GF-13 - Order directing medical examination

Form GF-13a - Order directing medical examination (inpatient)

Form GF-13b - Order directing emergency evaluation

Form GF-14 - Notice of motion

Form GF-15 - Order on motion

Form GF-16 - Order of dismissal

Form GF-17 - Petition for custody or visitation

Form GF-18 - Order on petition for custody or visitation

Form GF-19 - Petition for proceeding concerning an Indian child

Form GF-20 - Order determining petition for transfer of proceeding concerning an Indian child

Form GF-21 - Address confidentiality affidavit

Form GF-21a - Address confidentiality order

Form GF-22 - Petition for writ of habeas corpus

Form GF-23 - Writ of habeas corpus

Form GF-24 - Order to sheriff to return respondent to court following commitment

Form GF-25 - Violation of court order with commitment

Form GF-26 - Verification by governmental agency

Form GF-27 - Transfer of proceedings

Form GF-28 - Transfer of proceedings or probation supervision

Form GF-30 - Summons (publication)

Form GF-31 - Affidavit Relating To Indian Child Welfare Act

Form GF-32 - Addendum to Order-Findings of Fact and Conclusions of Law - Indian Child Welfare Act

Form GF-33 - 18-B services

Form GF-36a - Motion for an order that reasonable efforts are not required

Form GF-36b - Affidavit in support of motion for an order that reasonable efforts are not required

Form GF-37 - Order on motion for order that reasonable efforts are not required

Form GF-38 - Petition for termination or severance of lease or rental agreement

Form GF-39 - Order on petition pursuant to RPL s227-c for termination or severance of lease or rental agreement

Form GF-40 - Petition for modification of order of (custody) (visitation made by) (Family Court) (Supreme Court)

Form GF-40a - Order on petition for modification of custody or visitation made by Family Court or Supreme Court

Form GF-41 - Petition for enforcement of order of (custody) (visitation made by) (Family Court) (Supreme Court)

Form GF-41a - Order on petition to enforce order of custody or visitation made buy Family or Supreme Court

Form GF-42 - Special immigrant juvenile status order

Form GF-45 - Family First Prevention Services Act -Notice of Motion for Approval of Placement in a Qualified Residential Treatment Program (QRTP)

Form GF-45a - Family First Prevention Services Act - Affidavit in Support of Motion for Approval of Placement in a Qualified Residential Treatment Program (QRTP)

Form GF-46 - Family First Prevention Services Act -Order on Motion for Approval of Placement in a Qualified Residential Treatment Program (QRTP) Juvenile Delinquency Forms

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
